item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0836; 01:23PM; 146 E 66th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Eju6Xd; Florence; KNOCKDOWN: 29 firefighters extinguished the fire in 22 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to one room in the home (now updated to a duplex). Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E21 E221 E233 E26 E266 SQ21 T21 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0836; 01:01PM; 146 E 66th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Eju6Xd; Florence; Two story, single family dwelling with smoke showing from the first floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode and have located the seat of the fire in the living room.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E21 E221 E233 E26 E266 T21 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0367; 08:48AM; 15354 W Archwood St; MAP: https://bit.ly/31jRK7e; Van Nuys; KNOCKDOWN: 28 firefighters extinguished the fire in 19 minutes. This was determined to be an outside fire that extended into the vacant structure. Firefighters quickly addressed the exposed building and limited the fire to the eves. One adult female is being evaluated for unknown (at this time) medical complaint. No further details.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E239 E288 E39 E90 RA100 RA39 RA81 T39 T88; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0367; 08:29AM; 15354 W Archwood St; MAP: https://bit.ly/31jRK7e; Van Nuys; One story (vacant) single family dwelling with fire showing at impinging on an exposed building. Firefighters are in the offensive mode; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E239 E288 E39 E90 RA100 RA39 RA81 T39 T88; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1478; 08:22PM; 1029 S Cochran Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EfRQvl; Mid-Wilshire; KNOCKDOWN: 45 firefighters extinguished the fire in 22 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was prevented from extending into the attic. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 68; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 4; BC18 BC5 E226 E261 E294 E61 E68 RA29 RA61 RA829 T26 T61 T94; CH9; 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1478; 08:00PM; 1029 S Cochran Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EfRQvl; Mid-Wilshire; Two story, single family dwelling with heavy fire showing on the first floor. title.a: Update Structure Fire - FATALITY FATALITY 11/30/2021 INC#1272

item.description: Update FATALITY Structure Fire - FATALITY; INC#1272; 06:27PM; 20652 W Lassen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lqiWIG; Chatsworth; Firefighters continued searching through at least 4' of debris and located an adult female victim, determined deceased on scene. There are reports of two additional occupants who may have departed the scene prior but their locations are unknown at this time and crews continue to search the heavily packed residence. LAFD Arson and Counter-Terrorism Section is responding for the investigation per protocol for a fatality. PIO Captain Erik Scott is enroute to the scene for media availability. No further details.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AR1 BC15 BC17 E107 E287 E296 E305 E70 RA107 RA96 T105 T87; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1272; 06:10PM; 20652 W Lassen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lqiWIG; Chatsworth; Firefighters completed a secondary search and found no one. Information gathered on scene by incident command indicate the occupant is not home. Cause and $ loss TBD. The two exposed homes on either side of the fire unit were defended from damage. No further details.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 E107 E287 E296 E305 E70 RA107 RA96 T105 T87; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1272; 05:57PM; 20652 W Lassen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lqiWIG; Chatsworth; KNOCKDOWN: 31 firefighters extinguished the fire in 26 minutes. They encountered excessive storage conditions which hampered access to the seat of the fire. The occupant is unaccounted for and firefighters are worked to complete a primary search, made more challenging due to the storage in the home. No further details.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 E107 E287 E296 E305 E70 RA107 RA96 T105 T87; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1272; 05:31PM; 20652 W Lassen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lqiWIG; Chatsworth; Fire showing from a mobile home. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 E107 E287 E296 E305 E70 RA107 RA96 T105 T87; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart
